price: 62. Boye wana ezali esika ya malamu тропа kofanda to ezali nzete ya zaqqüm? (ezali nzete wana mbuma na yango ezali bololo ezali o kati ya lifelo, yango nde bilei ya bato ya mabe),
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
